kv1.4:1.3_0: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṁ jahatīti?
kv1.4:1.4_0: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṁ vicikicchaṁ sīlabbataparāmāsaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:1.5_2: ekadesaṁ sotāpattiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati,
kv1.4:1.7_0: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato ekadesaṁ ariyakantehi sīlehi na samannāgatoti?
kv1.4:2.2_0: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṁ jahati, vicikicchaṁ sīlabbataparāmāsaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:2.4_0: ekadesaṁ ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato, ekadesaṁ ariyakantehi sīlehi na samannāgatoti?
kv1.4:3.2_0: Vicikicchaṁ sīlabbataparāmāsaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:3.4_0: ekadesaṁ ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato, ekadesaṁ ariyakantehi sīlehi na samannāgatoti?
kv1.4:4.3_2: ekadesaṁ sotāpattiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati,
kv1.4:4.5_0: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato, ekadesaṁ ariyakantehi sīlehi na samannāgatoti?
kv1.4:5.1_0: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṁ jahatīti?
kv1.4:5.2_0: Oḷārikaṁ kāmarāgaṁ jahati, oḷārikaṁ byāpādaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:5.3_2: ekadesaṁ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati,
kv1.4:6.2_0: Oḷārikaṁ kāmarāgaṁ jahati, oḷārikaṁ byāpādaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:6.3_2: ekadesaṁ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati,
kv1.4:7.2_0: Oḷārikaṁ byāpādaṁ jahati, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:7.3_2: ekadesaṁ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati,
kv1.4:8.2_0: Oḷārikaṁ byāpādaṁ jahati, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese jahatīti.
kv1.4:8.3_2: ekadesaṁ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati,
kv1.4:9.1_0: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṁ jahatīti?
kv1.4:9.2_0: Aṇusahagataṁ kāmarāgaṁ jahati, aṇusahagataṁ byāpādaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:9.3_2: ekadesaṁ anāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati,
kv1.4:10.2_0: Aṇusahagataṁ kāmarāgaṁ jahati, aṇusahagataṁ byāpādaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:10.4_0: ekadesaṁ uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, ekadesaṁ na uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti?
kv1.4:11.2_0: Aṇusahagataṁ byāpādaṁ jahati, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:11.4_0: ekadesaṁ uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, ekadesaṁ na uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti?
kv1.4:12.3_2: ekadesaṁ anāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati,
kv1.4:13.1_0: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṁ jahatīti?
kv1.4:13.2_0: Rūparāgaṁ arūparāgaṁ mānaṁ uddhaccaṁ avijjaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:13.3_2: ekadesaṁ arahattappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati,
kv1.4:13.3_5: ekadesaṁ vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano
kv1.4:13.3_6: sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṅkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro
kv1.4:13.3_17: (ekadesaṁ sacchikātabbaṁ sacchikataṁ) ekadesaṁ sacchikātabbaṁ na sacchikatanti?
kv1.4:14.2_0: Rūparāgaṁ arūparāgaṁ jahati, mānaṁ uddhaccaṁ avijjaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:14.4_0: ekadesaṁ sacchikātabbaṁ sacchikataṁ, ekadesaṁ sacchikātabbaṁ na sacchikatanti?
kv1.4:15.2_0: Mānaṁ jahati, uddhaccaṁ avijjaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:15.4_0: ekadesaṁ sacchikātabbaṁ sacchikataṁ, ekadesaṁ sacchikātabbaṁ na sacchikatanti?
kv1.4:16.2_0: Uddhaccaṁ avijjaṁ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese jahatīti.
kv1.4:16.3_2: ekadesaṁ arahattappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati,
kv1.4:16.3_5: ekadesaṁ vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano
kv1.4:16.3_6: sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṅkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro
kv1.4:23.4_0: “yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvakassa virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi—
